text: Yeh log tumharay anjam kaar ka intizar kertay rehtay hain phir agar tumhen Allah fatah dey to yeh kehtay hain kay kiya hum tumharay sathi nahi aur kafiron ko thora sa ghlba mill jaye to (unn say) kehtay hain kay hum tum per ghalib na aaney lagay thay aur kiya hum ney tumhen musalmanon kay haathon say na bachaya tha? Pus qayamat mein khud Allah Taalaa tumharay darmiyan faisla keray ga aur Allah Taalaa kafiron ko eman walon per hergiz raah na dey ga
